Key Match Events: Livingstone hit a career-best and match-winning 124 not out
Phil Salt, Jacob Bethell, and Sam Curran all made 50s
West Indies set a record ODI total of 328 at the Sir Vivian Richards Stadium
Livingstone and Curran combined for a key 50 partnership
Livingstone hit three consecutive sixes and a four to win the match
Post-Match Reflections: Livingstone expressed happiness to have led from the front
Livingstone acknowledged feeling undervalued in previous ODIs but proved his worth today
Miscellaneous Highlights: England used nine bowlers across the innings
Four catches were dropped by England
Stark contrast between fielding and batting performance
